channel.title: Windows 7 Client Trouble
channel.description:
Everytime I run a client it just closes about 10 seconds later and i'm left with this message;
[code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=2840, t id=808 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Grant\Desktop\Devo client\hs_err_pid2840.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Any ideas ? xD

item.title: Windows 7 Client Trouble
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

My computer is windows 7 64bit, and it doesn’t with every client i download, webclients work fine, just downloadable clients.

& I just tried running as Administrator and it came up;

[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
The system cannot find the file xjava.exe.
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic
